calculatePendingReward(address,uint256).details: Calculate pending rewards for a stake position

params._circleToken: Address of the circle token to stake

depositRewards().details: Deposit ETH rewards into the pool

getUserStakes(address).details: Get all stake positions for a user

getUserTotalRewards(address).details: Get total rewards for a user across all positions

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

paused().details: Returns true if the contract is paused, and false otherwise.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

setLockPeriodMultiplier(uint256,uint256).details: Set lock period multiplier (only circle owner)

params.lockPeriodDays: Lock period in days (0 for flexible)

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

params.newAPY: New base APY in basis points

depositRewards().notice: Called by circle owner or factory to add rewards from fees
